languages.text: Странствующий торговец, представившийся Паломником, жаждет информации о мирах, богатых энергетическими кристаллами. Мужчина сообщил, в какой области его можно найти в ближайшее время.

traits.locale_text: Странствующий торговец, представившийся Паломником, жаждет информации о мирах, богатых энергетическими кристаллами. Мужчина сообщил, в какой области его можно найти в ближайшее время.

languages.text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.
languages.original_text: Странствующий торговец, представившийся Паломником, жаждет информации о мирах, богатых энергетическими кристаллами. Мужчина сообщил, в какой области его можно найти в ближайшее время.

traits.locale_text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.
A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.
A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.
A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.

languages.text: 一位自称“朝圣者”的流浪商人正在收集线索，寻找富含能量水晶的世界。他已经将接下来的航程告知于你，以便你可以找到他。
languages.original_text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.

traits.locale_text: 一位自称“朝圣者”的流浪商人正在收集线索，寻找富含能量水晶的世界。他已经将接下来的航程告知于你，以便你可以找到他。

languages.text: 巡礼者と自称する放浪商人は、エネルギー水晶が豊富な惑星についての情報を積極的に探している。彼は、それが近い将来どの地域で発見される可能性があるのかを示唆した。
languages.original_text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.

traits.locale_text: 巡礼者と自称する放浪商人は、エネルギー水晶が豊富な惑星についての情報を積極的に探している。彼は、それが近い将来どの地域で発見される可能性があるのかを示唆した。

languages.text: Un mercader ambulante que se hace llamar el Peregrino busca información sobre mundos con cristales de energía abundantes. Ha indicado una región que frecuentará próximamente.
languages.original_text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.

traits.locale_text: Un mercader ambulante que se hace llamar el Peregrino busca información sobre mundos con cristales de energía abundantes. Ha indicado una región que frecuentará próximamente.

languages.text: Ein fahrender Händler, der sich selbst als Pilger bezeichnet, ist begierig auf Informationen über Welten mit großen Energiekristallvorkommen. Er hat durchblicken lassen, wo er in naher Zukunft zu finden ist.
languages.original_text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.

traits.locale_text: Ein fahrender Händler, der sich selbst als Pilger bezeichnet, ist begierig auf Informationen über Welten mit großen Energiekristallvorkommen. Er hat durchblicken lassen, wo er in naher Zukunft zu finden ist.

languages.text: Un marchand ambulant qui se fait appeler le Pèlerin recherche des informations sur les mondes riches en cristaux d'énergie. Il a indiqué dans quelles régions il pouvait être trouvé à l'avenir.
languages.original_text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.

traits.locale_text: Un marchand ambulant qui se fait appeler le Pèlerin recherche des informations sur les mondes riches en cristaux d'énergie. Il a indiqué dans quelles régions il pouvait être trouvé à l'avenir.

languages.text: Kendine Seyyah diyen gezgin bir tacir, enerji kristalleri bakımından zengin dünyalar hakkında bilgi arayışında. Yakın gelecekte hangi bölgede olacağını söyledi.
languages.original_text: A wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim is eager for information about worlds rich in energy crystals. He has indicated in which region he can be found in the near future.

traits.locale_text: Kendine Seyyah diyen gezgin bir tacir, enerji kristalleri bakımından zengin dünyalar hakkında bilgi arayışında. Yakın gelecekte hangi bölgede bulunabileceğini söyledi.
